thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 27 of 2268
thread.title: Wendy Farleigh

author: Wendy Farleigh
title: Wendy Farleigh
text: I think my husband, a carpenter of 35 years, was the best judge of the quality of this product. He said that the blinds were so very easy to fit, that they fit perfectly and that I should buy our kitchen and dining room blinds from Blinds2go. He said paying a little more for bespoke blinds was a good move and that 'you didn't have to pay a fortune for blinds that actually fit ...and they're aluminium.' They were delivered as promised and our daughter is now happy that she has blinds that don't 'let the light in round the sides'. From my point of view they look good and were a really good price. Kitchen blinds next...
